basics.summary: Delivered $150k business value through 6 AI/ML achievements including 60% GPU cost reduction and <2min model rollbacks. MLOps Engineer specializing in LLM infrastructure, cost optimization, and production-scale deployment.

work.name: Easelect LTD

Deployed production systems serving 1M+ requests/day with 99.9% uptime SLA
